TopicTitle: KSP has unused music, (I think so.)

Articles.Content:
yo, i'm back from 2 years of inactivity. My old posts were from when I was 12, so don't worry about them.
I was looking through the games files and found an .ogg file called "editorLoop01".
Take a listen!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0so6hqlx0dcax1w/editorLoop01.ogg?dl=0
And if I put this thread in a wrong category, I apologize.

Edited July 29, 2020 by Twogoodsoul

Strange.  It actually sounds better than the editor loop in the more recent KSP versions, but that might be because I've been driven insane gotten annoyed from listening to it so often.

I've been playing for a long time, but I don't remember ever hearing that soundtrack.  Maybe other players might remember it.
